intro.title: Why Choose Us?
intro.content: With a team of leading expert lawyers, we commit to providing the most comprehensive, fast, and effective legal solutions for your business.
intro.label: About Us
intro.headline: Creating legal standards with absolute dedication.
intro.desc: With over 15 years of experience in Intellectual Property Law and Corporate Consulting, we are not just lawyers, but strategic partners helping your business overcome all legal barriers.
intro.usp1_desc: We own a team of lawyers with over 20 years of experience handling complex lawsuits, bringing strategic advantages to clients.
intro.usp2_desc: Applying advanced legal technology helps shorten file processing time by 40%, ensuring clients are always one step ahead of competitors.
intro.usp3_desc: No hidden fees committed. All fees are clearly notified before signing the service contract.
intro.usp4_desc: Network of partners in over 50 countries, helping businesses expand markets and protect international rights.

patent.title: Patent Registration
patent.desc: Exclusive protection for technical solutions and new technological processes.

trademark.title: Trademark Registration
trademark.desc: Build brand identity and prevent infringement.

copyright.title: Copyright
copyright.desc: Protect literary, artistic works, and computer software.

attorney.label: Founder
attorney.name: Lawyer Hoang Yen
attorney.quote: Justice is not just a destination, it is a journey.

services.patent_detail: We provide services for searching, assessing patentability, and representing clients in filing Patent/Utility Solution applications in Vietnam and internationally.
services.trademark_detail: Consulting services on brand strategy, searching for registrability, and carrying out procedures for exclusive trademark registration.
services.copyright_detail: Consultancy and implementation of copyright registration procedures for literary, artistic, scientific works, and computer software.

workflow.title: Standard Workflow
workflow.subtitle: Commitment to transparency and efficiency in every step
workflow.step2_desc: Propose valid options optimizing cost & time.
workflow.step3_desc: Drafting, filing and working with authorities.
workflow.step4_desc: Receive certificate and post-licensing protection advice.

services_view.empty_desc: Please try another keyword or category.

cta.title: Need In-depth Legal Consultation?
cta.desc: Contact our team of lawyers now to receive the optimal solution for your business issues.

service_detail.cta_desc: Leave your information, a lawyer will contact you in 15 minutes.

about_view.story_p1:
ear Valued Clients & Partners,

PATVN was born not just to consult on law, but to accompany big dreams. We believe that every idea, every creation of yours is an invaluable asset that needs to be cherished and protected.

In this journey, your trust is the greatest motivation for us to constantly improve. Thank you for choosing PATVN as the guardian for your intellect.
about_view.quote: "Law is a tool to create prosperity, not a barrier."
about_view.mission_desc: In a flat world, where ideas can be copied in seconds, PATVN stands here to ensure that your creativity is unique. We don't just process files, we tell stories of integrity and the aspiration for justice. Our mission is to create a solid legal fence, so that from there, your business can freely reach out to the big sea without the fear of infringement.
about_view.mission: We are committed to protecting your intellectual property as if it were our own.
about_view.val_trust_desc: More than a promise, it is honor. We protect your business secrets like the apple of our eye.
about_view.val_understand_desc: We do not apply a rigid formula. We listen to the heartbeat of your business to design the most suitable solution.
about_view.val_distinct_desc: Creative within the legal framework. We find the smartest ways to optimize benefits for clients.
about_view.val_pro_desc: Perfection comes from the smallest things. From service attitude to every semicolon in legal documents.

contact_view.title: Contact Us
contact_view.subtitle: Connect now for free legal consultation
contact_view.success_desc: We have received your message and will respond shortly.
